descriptor.name: Kraft Stainless Steel Lunch Box with Handle
descriptor.long_desc: Carry your home cooked food in style with Kraft stainless steel Lunch boxes/tiffins; it keeps food hot, fresh, retains taste and nutrition for long hours. These boxes are designed to give you a sense of homemade food on the go. These premium tiffins can be used by adults and children. It is made from the finest stainless steel material which ensures strength, quality and durability. It is a breeze to assemble. Kraft aims to provide good quality products to customers so that they are always satisfied. You have made Kraft a part of your family and we want to strengthen this relationship by serving you better. Our products will help make household chores a breeze saving you time and energy to spend with your loved ones. Food Grade Stainless Steel Kraft Lunch Box is manufactured under strict quality control for maximum safety with finest stainless-steel material which ensures strength, quality and durability. Food Grade Stainless Steel makes it extremely hygienic, rust proof, unbreakable and looks elegant with its steel-mirror Ô¨Ånishing. BPA Free Keeps your food uncontaminated with its BPA-free thermo-steel that is durable. All components are 100% food grade and non toxic. BPA resists the growth of bacteria.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Stainless Steel Contura Inner Lid Pressure Cooker Induction Compatible
descriptor.long_desc: The body and lid are made from superior grade AISI 304 non-magnetic stainless steel. The cooker has an external base of AISI 430 grade magnetic stainless steel which makes it induction compatible. It has a 6.6 mm thick sandwich bottom to ensure uniform heating and no hotspots. The base always stays flat and never bulges. The cooker body has curved sides for easy stirring. It stays bright, does not pit or corrode, is extremely hygienic and stays looking new for years. Suitable for use on all domestic gas, electric, halogen, ceramic and induction cooktops.

descriptor.name: HAWKINS Futura Deep Fry Pan Hard Anodised Kadai with Glass Lid
descriptor.long_desc: The Futura Hard Anodised Deep-Fry Pans are distinguished by elegant, comfortable rosewood handles fixed on sturdy stainless steel brackets which are permanently riveted to the pans. The handles are carefully designed to provide greater comfort and safety, particularly when handling heavy loads or hot oil. The pans have curved sides suitable for deep-frying and stir-frying. The Hard Anodised finish on these pans will stay looking new for years. The pans are offered with a Round Bottom for greater convenience during stir-frying and ideal for use on domestic gas stoves or radiant electric cooktops. The toughened Glass Lid of 4 mm thick, heat-resistant glass with a strong stainless steel rim and stay-cool knob stops splatter of hot foods.

descriptor.name: Rustic Revival Kitchen Jar
descriptor.long_desc: Step into a world of culinary enchantment with this kitchen ceramic jar.The smooth ceramic surface provides a protective haven for your pantry staples, keeping them fresh and within reach. Its charming design sparks joy and creativity as you reach for your favorite ingredients, infusing your cooking experience with a touch of magic.Whether used to store spices, cookies, or secret family recipes, this ceramic jar is a delightful blend of functionality and artistic expression, transforming your kitchen into a culinary wonderland.Purely handmade Indian origin product, please handle gently as they are Fragile in nature.Happy Storing !
